docs.text:
Merlin.jl


Merlin.jl
 is a neural network library in 
Julia
.




★ Functions




Getting Started




It aims to provide a fast, flexible and concise neural network library for machine learning.




★ Install


#julia
 Pkg.clone(
https://github.com/hshindo/Merlin.jl.git
)








★ Optional Requirements




cuDNN
 v4 (for CUDA GPU)

docs.text:
Overview


Merlin.jl provides many primitive functions.


Every computation is preserved.




★ Decoding


v
 
=
 
Variable
()








★ Training

=
 
SGD
(
0.001
)



for
 
i
 
=
 
1
:
10

  
v
 
=
 
Variable
()

  
y
 
=
 
v
 
|
 
f1
 
|
 
f2

  
y
.
grad
 
=
 
ones
()

  
backward!
(
y
)

  
update!
(
opt
,
 
y
)


end
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Merlin.jl provides many primitive functions.  Every computation is preserved.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text:
opt   =   SGD ( 0.001 )  for   i   =   1 : 10 
   v   =   Variable () 
   y   =   v   |   f1   |   f2 
   y . grad   =   ones () 
   backward! ( y ) 
   update! ( opt ,   y )  end
docs.title: ★ Training

docs.text:
Types


There are three basic types:




Variable


Functor


Optimizer






★ Variable


Variable
 has 
value
 and 
grad
.


x
 
=
 
Variable
(
AFArray
(
Float32
,
10
,
5
))


x
.
value


x
.
grad








★ Functor


Functor
 is an abstract type of functors.
